mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, inner_query.* FROM ( SELECT inquiry_no, inquiry_title, customer_id, TO_CHAR(inquiry_created, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') AS inquiry_created, inquiry_status FROM tbl_inquiry ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC ) inner_query WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT inquiry_no, customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, TO_CHAR(inquiry_created, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') AS inquiry_created, reply_content, reply_created, inquiry_status FROM tbl_inquiry WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiry_no}
SELECT user_name AS userName, account_id AS accountId, email, phone_number AS phoneNumber, account_role AS accountRole, reg_date AS regDate FROM tbl_account WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_inquiry SET reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_created = SYSDATE, inquiry_status = '답변완료' WHERE inquiry_no = #{inquiry_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}
